card.name: Death Smoke
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

card.name: Fatal Attacker Horvath
card.text: ■ While you have at least 1 Armorloid in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power during its attacks.

card.name: Rothus, the Traveler
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Burst Shot
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy all creatures that have power 2000 or less.

card.name: Aerodactyl Kooza
card.text: ■ While attacking a creature, this creature can't be blocked. ■ Power Attacker

card.name: Mongrel Man
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Automated Weaponmaster Machai
card.text: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Otherworldly Warrior Naglu
card.text: ■ This creature can't be attacked. ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bat Doctor, Shadow of Undeath
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may return another creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Zombie Carnival
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a race. Return up to 3 creatures of that race from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Fists of Forever
card.text: ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. Whenever that creature wins a battle this turn, untap it.

card.name: Relentless Blitz
card.text: ■ Choose a race. This turn, each creature of that race can attack untapped creatures and can't be blocked while attacking a creature.

card.name: Simian Warrior Grash
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Armorloids is destroyed, your opponent chooses a card in his mana zone and puts it into his graveyard.

card.name: Galek, the Shadow Warrior
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Explosive Trooper Zalmez
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 2 or fewer shields, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Smash Warrior Stagrandu
card.text: ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. ■ Whenever this creature attacks a creature that has power 6000 or more, this creature gets +9000 power until the End Step
